data.content:
Danh từ
(từ Anh) (viết tắt Esq)
Ngài (viết sau tên họ, trên địa chỉ đề trên thư)
he wrote "Peter Mitchell, Esq" on the envelope
ông ta viết "Ngài Peter Mitchell" lên phong bì

noun
plural -quires
[count] - used as a title of courtesy after a name; in writing usually used in its abbreviated form Esq.
John Smith, Esq.
The use of Esq. after a man's name was once common in British English but is now considered somewhat old-fashioned. In U.S. English, Esq. is used in writing after the name of an attorney, and it is used for both men and women.
Sheila Jones, Esq.
